content: La precedente valuta italiana è la lira e il suo simbolo "₤". Non è legata alla lira turca.
translations: eng:The former Italian currency was the lira and its symbol was ₤. It's not related to the Turkish lira
eng:The previous Italian monetary unit was the lira, with the symbol ₤. It isn't linked to the Turkish lira
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Heracleum (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
